Package br.com.caelum.vraptor.restfulie.relation

Interface Summary
Relation Represents a relation between a resource and another.
RelationBuilder Responsible for allowing clients to create relations
 

Class Summary
ControllerBasedRelation A transition which will invoke a controller's method.
DefaultRelationBuilder Builder to help creating transitions.
UriBasedRelation A relation based on a resource URI.
